item.title: Shifting Gears
item.description: I often use the metaphor of shifting gears to describe why learning and process change is important. If you’re old (like me), you may remember driving a car with manual transmission.

item.title: We Want A Doing, Not A Meeting
item.description: “We don’t want a meeting!” This was my response when a team I was working on was told that someone from the UI team would be able to meet with us for an hour “sometime tomorrow.
